name: Matty
description:
Matty is an exploration game based around peeking into someone else's life. In the small town of Bridgewood, the autumn of 1998 brings the third month since local teenager Matty Mathers has been home. 

This is my first Unity game and my first published game, there are certainly some issues with it but I am still learning!

Movement - WASD
Camera - Mouse
Camera Zoom - Right click

All assets not listed under credits are my own. Thank you!
